channel.title: security on mxinden
channel.description: Recent content in security on mxinden

item.title: 33rd DistSys Reading Group - BGP 3
item.description: In our third BGP session we focused on BGP security, more specifically we discussed how to perform hijack and interception attacks using BGP. The primary paper of the session was: Birge-Lee, Henry, et al. “Sico: Surgical interception attacks by manipulating bgp communities.” Proceedings of the 2019 ACM SIGSAC Conference on Computer and Communications Security. 2019. A good introduction to RPKI can be found here.
